databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT MS_SENIN_CAREER.MS_SENIN_ID ,
MS_SENIN_CAREER.ACADEMIC_BACKGROUND , MS_SENIN_CAREER.YEAR_OF_GRADUATION ,
MS_SENIN_CAREER.COMPANY , MS_SENIN_CAREER.JOINED , MS_SENIN_CAREER.LEAVE ,
MS_SENIN_CAREER.DELETE_FLAG , MS_SENIN_CAREER.SEND_FLAG , MS_SENIN_CAREER.VESSEL_ID , MS_SENIN_CAREER.DATA_NO , MS_SENIN_CAREER.USER_KEY , MS_SENIN_CAREER.RENEW_DATE , MS_SENIN_CAREER.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_SENIN_CAREER.TS
FROM MS_SENIN_CAREER
WHERE MS_SENIN_CAREER.DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO MS_SENIN_CAREER(
MS_SENIN_ID ,
ACADEMIC_BACKGROUND, YEAR_OF_GRADUATION, COMPANY, JOINED, LEAVE,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES(
:MS_SENIN_ID ,
:ACADEMIC_BACKGROUND, :YEAR_OF_GRADUATION, :COMPANY, :JOINED, :LEAVE,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SENIN_CAREER SET
ACADEMIC_BACKGROUND = :ACADEMIC_BACKGROUND ,YEAR_OF_GRADUATION = :YEAR_OF_GRADUATION ,COMPANY = :COMPANY ,JOINED = :JOINED ,LEAVE = :LEAVE
,DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG ,SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG ,VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID ,DATA_NO = :DATA_NO ,USER_KEY = :USER_KEY ,RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE ,RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID ,TS = :TS
WHERE MS_SENIN_ID = :MS_SENIN_ID AND TS = :TS
